prompts: Create a fearsome water-type Pokemon with majestic fins and a serpentine body.
I want a dragon-like creature that evokes power and dominance in its design.
Generate a Pokemon with vibrant blue scales and striking yellow accents.
Make an aquatic Pokemon that has both fierce and graceful features.
Imagine a legendary sea creature that commands respect with its imposing presence.
Design a Pokemon that is both intimidating and beautiful, embodying the essence of water.
Show me a Pokemon that can thrive in both ocean depths and coastal regions.
